hero.title: Imperium Software
hero.description: We craft exceptional digital experiences with cutting-edge technology and creative excellence. Your success is our mission.

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive digital solutions tailored to your needs

customSoftware.title: Custom Software Solutions
customSoftware.description: We offer a custom product designed by your needs and expectations, built from scratch.

outsourcing.title: Outsourcing
outsourcing.description: We offer our experience in software development by taking part into your projects. We are flexible when it comes to collaborating with other developers so we can integrate smoothly into your process.

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Clean, modern websites designed to convert—fast, responsive, and SEO-friendly. We craft UI/UX that looks great on every device and feels effortless to use.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: We keep your product stable, secure, and up to date after launch. Ongoing monitoring, bug fixes, improvements, and performance tuning—backed by clear response times.

about.title: Meet Our Team
about.subtitle: The minds behind Imperium Software
about.description: Led by two passionate entrepreneurs with a shared vision of digital excellence

member1.name: Peter Petrov
member1.description: Two years of experience in software development. Design and UI/UX enthusiast.

member2.name: Hristo Nikolov
member2.description: Two years of experience in software development. Backend powerhouse and architecturally minded.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Amazing
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project?
contact.description: Get in touch with us to discuss your project and discover how we can help bring your vision to life.
